text: The Kids are All Right is a 2010 American comedy-drama movie. The movie stars Julianne Moore, Annette Bening, Mark Ruffalo and Mia Wasikowska. This movie is about a California lesbian couple and the events happening around them. This movie was nominated for several Academy Awards. == Other websites == * Category:2010 comedy-drama movies Category:2010 LGBT movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:English-language movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies set in California Category:American independent movies
title: The Kids Are All Right (movie)
